meaningMnemonic: Your nation's <radical>flag</radical> sits on top of a <radical>cape</radical>d <radical>mouth</radical>. This is the symbol for the "<kanji>Bureau</kanji> of Secret Things." It's a special <kanji>department</kanji> of your government made to keep things hidden.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>bureau</kanji>'s best-kept secret is cloaking devices that <reading>cloak you</reading> (きょく) with the press of a button.
